name: Touhou: Stairway to Space
description:
New incident in Gensokyo! Meteors are falling and one of them even destroyed Reimu's shrine! Make your way into space, dodging all the bullets and beat the boss!

This was a university project (2020), the second videogame I made. Made in 3 months on my own. It's tiny as a demo, but fun to play.

You can find me on Twitter and Instagram. Music by DJ Abner.
